reviews.review: CSGO is fun, the thing is that you must have a premade if you want to rank up. If you instead  want to play competitive for fun you can play without a premade. A lot of the people I met on competitives are great and extremely funny (especially the ruskis and eastern Europeans/Middle eastern people)
